description: Wow, that's impressive. It's targeted at older children (not as educational as GCompris which is for 2-10 years old children) and pretty much like a children's computer all in itself. It comes with lots of quite well made games (the best tetris clone that I know on Ubuntu, for instance!), applications for writing, drawing, and much more. Solid stuff. I give only for stars because it supports only a very limited range of language at the present and for some apps only limited language support (GCompris offers many many more, all fully supported), and the user interface is not very well designed, rather cluttered, and would need refinement here and there.

le doy todas las estrellas,lo mejor que hay tiene el robot sara
summary: Nonono mi infancia en una app de Ubuntu
